massim.framework

Interface Action

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGridSimulationAgentAction, GraphSimulationAgentAction, GraphSimulationAgentAction, GraphSimulationAgentAction, GridSimulationAgentAction, GridSimulationAgentAction, GridSimulationAgentAction, GridSimulationAgentAction, GridSimulationAgentAction, InvalidAction

    public interface Action
extends Serializable
    This interface must be implemented by any class that represents an action performed by some agent. This interface does so far nothing (except implying that a class must be serializable) and it's primary purpose is to have typesafety.
